alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 19 at 3:32PM MDT until July 19 at 4:15PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Lincoln County in east central Colorado... * Until 415 PM MDT. * At 331 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Truckton, or 32 miles east of Colorado Springs, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Forder. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
